{{Infobox sports rivalry | name = All-time Albanian derby | other names = | image = | caption = Derbi between [[KF Tirana|Tirana]] and [[KS Vllaznia ShkodÃ«r|Vllaznia]] | city or region = [[Tirana]] & [[ShkodÃ«r]],
{{flag|Albania}} | first contested = 1930 | teams involved = [[KF Tirana]], [[KS Vllaznia ShkodÃ«r]] | most wins = [[KF Tirana]] (71) | most player appearances = | mostrecent = | nextmeeting = | total = | league = [[Kategoria superiore]] | regularseason = | postseason = | largestvictory = }} {{Location map+|Albania|float=right|width=225|caption=Location of [[KF Tirana|Tirana]] and [[KS Vllaznia ShkodÃ«r|Vllaznia]]|places= {{Location map~|Albania|lat=41.326 |long=19.816 |label=[[KF Tirana]]}} {{Location map~|Albania|lat=42.066667 |long=19.5 |label=[[KS Vllaznia ShkodÃ«r|Vllaznia]]}} }} The '''All-time Albanian derby''' or '''Oldest Albanian derby''' is the name given to any [[association football|football]] match contested between [[SK Tirana]] and [[Vllaznia ShkodÃ«r]] football clubs, two of the oldest clubs in [[Albania]]. It is the longest currently running top-flight [[derby]] in Albania. ==Historical derby== [[KF Tirana|Tirana]] and [[KS Vllaznia ShkodÃ«r|Vllaznia]] were the first [[Association football|football]] clubs in [[Albania]], respectively on 1920 and 1919. At that point the rivalry started. ==Win-loss totals== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !Competition !Played !KF Tirana !Draw !Vllaznia !KF Tirana
